channel.title: [req]where is the pencil and paint bucket for photoshop cs2?
channel.description: NO FLAMING!!! I KNOW I AM A PHOTOSHOP NOOB SO JUST SHUT UP!!! Can someone please post here and help me with this easy question

item.title: [req]where is the pencil and paint bucket for photoshop cs2?
item.dc:creator: @kaza Kaza
item.description:
@kaza wrote:

For the paint bucket, right-click on the gradient tool and select paint bucket and choose either pattern of foreground.

Read full topic
item.source: [req]where is the pencil and paint bucket for photoshop cs2?

item.title: [req]where is the pencil and paint bucket for photoshop cs2?
item.dc:creator: @udluv2 udluv2
item.description:
@udluv2 wrote:

Dont worry i had the same trouble when I started. To get the pencil Right Click on the paint brush in the tools and a menu will come up. Then select pencil. You can also do this on other tools.

Hope this helped.

Read full topic
item.source: [req]where is the pencil and paint bucket for photoshop cs2?
